import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const AddUserForm = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", emailId: "", password: "", phoneNo: "", street: "", city: "", pincode: "", }); const handleUserInput = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const saveUser = () => {}; return (
